meanings.definition: The act of bringing something up to date or modernizing it.
meanings.sent1: The aggiornamento of the old computer system made it faster and more efficient.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was due to their constant aggiornamento of their products.
meanings.sent3: The aggiornamento of the dusty library brought it into the 21st century.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe needed an aggiornamento to keep up with the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent5: The aggiornamento of the city's infrastructure was long overdue.

meanings.definition: The process of updating or renewing something.
meanings.sent1: The aggiornamento of the software fixed all the bugs and glitches.
meanings.sent2: Regular aggiornamento of your skills is essential in today's fast-paced world.
meanings.sent3: The aggiornamento of the recipe gave it a new delicious twist.
meanings.sent4: Her daily aggiornamento of the to-do list kept her organized and on track.
meanings.sent5: The aggiornamento of the museum's exhibits attracted more visitors.

meanings.definition: The modernization or renewal of something, especially in relation to the Catholic Church.
meanings.sent1: The aggiornamento of the church's teachings reflected a more contemporary approach.
meanings.sent2: The Vatican Council brought about an aggiornamento in the Catholic Church.
meanings.sent3: The aggiornamento of the church choir's music repertoire was well-received by the congregation.
meanings.sent4: His speech called for an aggiornamento in the church's outreach programs.
meanings.sent5: The aggiornamento of the church's architecture blended traditional and modern styles.
